name: CyberPunk 2D
description:
CyberPunk 2D is a niche platformer with a Hacking mechanic

It was made for Joshua Mcleans Retro Platformer Jam, Theme: CyberPunk
Theres only one level but it shows off all the mechanics I had time to make in the Jam

You can press buttons to toggle states of items EG: Lights, Doors, Cameras, And Gates
